fields.summary: BlackBerry: Make sure that all templates that studio presents user during project creation work as expected

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1.Add the path for blackberry titanium sdk to studio.
2.Go to create new titanium project.
3.Select default app template.
4.Click next.
5.Fill in the project name etc.
6.Click finish.
7.You will see that you get the error : internal error : URI not absolute.
8.You will also see that though you get this error the project gets created in studio.

Expected Result:
1.We should not get any errors while creating a BB project.

Note: attached is the screenshot for the error.

Actual Result:
1.Getting a error while creating a BB project in studio.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: Internal error while creating a BlackBerry project in Studio on win 8 & win 7.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 3.0.0.201211191701
blackberry 10 simulator
Blackberry 10 sdk
windows 8
windows 7
